attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unlike Lawyers, Doctors and University undergraduates etc. Pilot's lack the necessary support and funding needed to train as pilots and gain the amount of experience needed to obtain their first job.
I think the Government should back a drive to assist with funding for Pilot training in the form of student loans or something similar in the way university students are helped with their choice of career. Why not Pilots?!
